response_parsed.summary: This guide explains how to containerize a FastAPI web backend application using Docker and multi-stage builds in Python 3.12+. It demonstrates best practices for building, running, and scaling your FastAPI service inside containers.

Set up a development environment with Python 3.12+ and FastAPI
Dockerize the FastAPI application using Dockerfile
Implement multi-stage builds for reduced image size
Run the containerized FastAPI application locally and on production platforms
